Speaker: Frederik Ramm

Language: English

Media: Video

This talk gives an overview about OSM Inspector, a QA tool that has been with OSM for over six years and that is still being extended continuously. We'll not so much concern ourselves with the actual QA checks that OSMI offers, but instead look at the various technologies employed by OSMI to run its analyses, some of which are still the same we coded six years ago, and some already use more modern approaches. With its altogether five different data sources, OSMI comprehensively illustrates different ways of processing OSM data, and their respective pros and cons.
